summary: Two teenage girls on a mission to find drugs at a rave get more than they bargained for. One is sexually assaulted and they are both tortured in horrific ways. The attackers seek refuge in the parents' of one of the victims' homes.
cast: Kevin Gage|Sage Stallone|Kelly K.C. Quann|Maya Barovich|Chantal Degroat|Stephen Wozniak|Deborah Lacey|Scott Richards|Ken Medlock|Jeb Barrows|Ron Althoff|Red Horton|Steven Jay Bernheim
title: Chaos
